name: github-url-to-object
description: Extract user, repo, and other interesting properties from GitHub URLs

scripts.build: browserify index.js --standalone gh | buble > dist/gh.js; buble index.js > dist/commonjs.js
scripts.deploy: npm run build && git subtree push --prefix dist origin gh-pages && open https://zeke.github.io/github-url-to-object

author: zeke
